contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement <!-- See Template:Infobox settlement for additional fields and descriptions --> | name = Yenipazar | image_skyline = | image_caption = | image_shield = | pushpin_map = Turkey | latd = 37 |latm = 49 |lats = 37 |latNS = N | longd = 28 |longm = 11 |longs = 51 |longEW = E | coordinates_display = inline,title | coordinates_format = dms | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = [[Turkey]] | subdivision_type1 = [[Provinces of Turkey|Province]] | subdivision_name1 = [[Aydın Province|Aydın]] | subdivision_type2 = [[Districts of Turkey|District]] | subdivision_name2 = Yenipazar | leader_party = | leader_title = Mayor | leader_name = Mehmet Yüsran Erden | leader_title1 = [[Kaymakam]] | leader_name1 = Ünal Kılıçarslan | area_footnotes = {{Turkey district areas|SOURCE}} | area_blank1_title = District | area_blank1_km2 = {{Turkey district areas|Aydın|Yenipazar}} | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = {{Turkey district populations|SOURCE|Aydın}} | population_urban = {{Turkey district populations|Aydın|Yenipazar|şehir}} | population_as_of = {{Turkey district populations|YEAR}} | population_blank1_title = District | population_blank1 = {{Turkey district populations|Aydın|Yenipazar|toplam}} | population_density_blank1_km2 = auto | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | website = {{URL| www.yenipazar.bel.tr | www.yenipazar.bel.tr }} }} '''Yenipazar''' is a town and a small district of [[Aydın Province]] in the [[Aegean Region, Turkey|Aegean]] region of [[Turkey]], {{convert|45|km|mi|0|abbr=on}} from the city of [[Aydın]] on the road to Denizli. Yenipazar itself is a quiet rural town of 6,423 people providing high schools and other facilities to the surrounding district, although in the last two decades the population has declined as people move to Turkey's larger cities for higher education and careers. The local cuisine includes a delicious flat-bread pizza called [[pide]]. [[Adnan Menderes University]] has a school here offering diplomas in banking and finance, and the student population has brought Yenipazar more bars and other social amenities than you would expect from a town of this size. ==Population== year - town - district as a whole 2010 6,423 13,325 2000 7,006 15,492 1990 8,078 17,630 ==Places of interest== * The house of prominent local [[Turkish War of Independence]] resistance leder [[Yörük Ali Efe]] is now a museum to his life and career. ==References== {{Reflist}} == External links == * [http://www.yenipazar.gov.tr District governor's official website] * [http://www.yerelnet.org.tr/belediyeler/index.php?belediyeid=129299 local information] {{tr icon}} * [http://www.yenipazarav.org/album.asp Yenipazar hunting club photo album] {{Districts of Turkey|provname=Aydın|image=Aydin|sortkey=Yenipazar|}} [[Category:Populated places in Aydın Province]] [[Category:Cittaslow]] [[Category:Districts of Aydın Province]] {{Aydın-geo-stub}}
